name: DeeperMiner
description:
DeeperMiner

DeeperMiner is a dungeon action game.

You're a lone Dwarf who want all gems in this dungeon.

But your tribe is not according to you.

Try to rob all their gems and reach the bottom of this dungeon (if there is one)

 INPUTS :

- Left mouse button ( move / attack )

- Right mouse button ( shot an arrow )

- Mouse wheel button ( /!\ don't press it /!\ )

- Escape to open menu

TIPS :

- You need to kill all enemies and mine all gems in each level to acces to the next.

- Break jars to get 20% chance to loot arrows (5 by stack looted).

- Break crates and barrels to get 30% chance to loot a new weapon.

- Open the chest at each 5 levels to get one additional life (3 max at same time)
